properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 2:44AM EST until January 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west to northwest winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 4 to 6 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up
to 25 kt and seas 4 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM
EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 PM EST this
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
